metadata.description:
The devil is in the details, but have you found God?

About this song: that odd feeling when you watch someone you care about act dishonest and fake- making small talks and laughing at jokes that aren't even funny. 

This is my first alternative-rock song release. 

The price of this music NFT reflects the value and integrity I'd like to uphold for my collectors. There will be airdrops and viral drops in the future but this one is not it. I'm building a tight circle of collectors that sees the longevity of my creative career and would like to grow with me. I'm evolving beyond just dropping pop songs. I'm here to deliver the never-been dones, push the boundaries, raise all the eyebrows- all of which takes a lot of support. 

For me creating music NFTs mean fighting the reasons why music has been practically free for more than two decades. As an artist I'm here to give you a reason to HODL. I'm here to create hype. It's my job to make it weird. Music NFTs is more than just releasing a song. It's combining fintech creativity with the human essence of music. I'm thinking visual arts, CGI, Dynamic NFTs, IRL experiences, I can't give too much away but I'm creating a fantasy galaxy and it is integral for me to find supporters who see the value in what I am doing, for example, getting nude on the blockchain.

This is my genesis nude debut on the blockchain.

Why am I nood? 
I will fight through my aphasia to explain. 
In essence, I'm sexualizing to desexualize. 
As a woman I am told that when my breast are exposed I become a sexual object, not taken into consideration that I, as someone who controls my body, dictate whether I'm giving sexy or when I'm just being nude. I choose to be nude on my album covers because that's what I look like barebones-  an artist, a human, an explorer. 

It wasn't an easy decision as I'm from a conservative culture that will hop on any reason to shame a woman's sexuality, all of which I take as fuel for me to follow my visionary guts. I have never been everyone's cup of tea, therefore receiving your support shows who's really here for the ride. 

Proceeds will go towards inscribing my first Ordinal! Golden Egg will receive 5% of the Ordinal mint. 

Music by Eunice Wong and Jorge Montes de Oca
Album Cover by Eunice Wong
Photo by Frank Synowizz

lyrics.text:
I recognize the way you feel
The way you're standing still
I recognize it all, it all
From the way you talk 
Demanding strangers' presence
Then you make those small talks
Just to make those small talks
uh-oh

Even white lies
To make them high

You take the path ahead with nothing to decide
Have you found God in the details?

Details. Details. Details. Details.
Details. Details. Details. Details.

metadata.name: Details #1
metadata.title: Details
